bibl.title: On P. Yadin 37 = P. Hever 65.

series.title: Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism.

bibl.title: Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert
bibl.author: KATZOFF, Ranon

bibl.note: P. Yadin I, 37 = P. XHev/Se 65, which belongs to the Salome archive, is not a marriage contract, but a dowry receipt.
bibl.seg: KATZOFF Ranon, On P. Yadin 37 = P. Hever 65.
Ranon KATZOFF and David SCHAPS (Edd.), Law in the Documents of the Judaean Desert = Supplements to the Journal for the Study of Judaism. 96 (Leiden, 2005) pp. 133-144.
